section1.subHeader: Hey, I’m Mairéad, a visual storyteller.
section1.paragraph1: I’m passionate about creating intuitive experiences through sleek interfaces and delightful interactions. I focus heavily on investigating user needs and delivering a product or service that matches or exceeds these needs.
section1.paragraph2: I also love to play sports (tennis or surfing being top of that list so hit me up for a game/surf) and while eating food can arguably not be called a passion…I will have gladly have that argument over a bit of cheese on a cracker.
section1.paragraph3: You can view more about me on

section2.paragraph1: I’m trying my damndest to stand up on a surf board…and turn. Mostly the standing up part though, it’s hard! I also play tennis and tag rugby—but I’ll really play any kind of sport depending on my surroundings! I’m a big fan of food...so you’ll usually find me devouring a steak or heaping some cheese onto a cracker.
